about_the_game:
Survive as long as possible against the zombie horde of ZOMBIAX EVIL ! Alone or in coop mode, play as an elite soldier, arm yourself to the teeth and try to rid the whole of humanity of zombie vermin ! Become a Legend of the Resistance !

ZOMBIAX EVIL plunges players into an unprecedented global conflict! 99% of humanity has been decimated by the Coranavirus, turning human beings into horrible walking corpses. In FPS or TPS mode, survive the waves of zombies more numerous and resistant than ever !



Try to find laser weapons as soon as possible to evaporate your enemies ! Whether it’s small-scale map or gigantic territory, players will deploy alongside their friends in a truly immersive experience or in solo mode.

ZOMBIAX EVIL brings players state-of-the-art gameplay, with all-new weapon handling, advanced AI system, photorealistic NANITE technology textures, new armory and other gameplay innovations that elevate this game to total immersion.

Also choose the place of your clash with the zombies; from the catacombs of Paris to the torrid deserts of Australia and California to the holy city of India "Varanasi". Also includes the map: HELL ARENA.

content_descriptors.notes: Game with violent scenes, involving zombies in profusion; enemies disappearing at their death by a violent evaporation of blood.
